member.name: T:Plugin.pbXSettings.Abstractions.ISettingsStorage
member.summary: An interface that defines methods for accessing a native settings storage.

member.name: M:Plugin.pbXSettings.Abstractions.ISettingsStorage.GetStringAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Should retrieve a string described by identifier from native settings storage.

member.name: M:Plugin.pbXSettings.Abstractions.ISettingsStorage.SetStringAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Should store string in native settings storage giving it identifier .
